showerReviews.reviewText: Nice clean bathrooms. Came to park semi overnight and received a hot, clean, remodeled shower. Thanks for thinking of the truckers. Will be back again.

‚Ä¶ any more but if you put fuel in Palmyra AmBest Fuel Truck STOP the give you a free coffee shower and point and you buy however you want inside the store NOT IN CAMERON AmBest truck stop on hwy 36 why ??
Has decent parking area for a truck stop, about 60 spots total. On a serious question to call yourself a truck stop,  only 1 shower???!!!

locations.title: Jonez Travel Mart

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ I got a good hot shower with good water pressure, the showers are very clean and also affordable which is a huge plus. If I could give more stars I would!! Wayy better than most truck stops. Thanks for making my day so much better! üòäüëç ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ truck stop and clean as well. I did my laundry for 1.50$ wash and 1.50$ dry. One of the best shower i ever had on any truck stops. They have also truck driver lunge and some billiards,darts,soccer table..etc...also their restroom is clean. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ people have realized they can stay home and collect a check from the government rather than working. That being said the people that do work here are great. It‚Äôs nice to know at the end of a long day you can get a good meal and hot shower.

One of the worst showers in the country. Employees smoke in shower building. As an ex smoker that isn't nice to deal with after a long days work, then having your nice clean clothes with the faint smell of cigarettes after you just shower. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ store was crude and very rude. When tired drivers come in and ask for a shower, they are told at 6:00 in the evening that they won't have any clean showers until after his shift is over at 11:00pm.  If he's too lazy to do his ‚Ä¶

I bought 120 gallons worth of fuel. I asked for 2 showers.Cashier laughed and said I only get one free shower. Gotta pay for second. I told him so if I stopped at 50 gallons of fuel and came back and got another 50 I would've got that ‚Ä¶
No hot water in the shower.  Would not go there if I knew it. This is why all big truck stops better. More parkings,  food varieties.  This is regular gas station.
Might not be your brand name truck stop but Clean shower and a really good meal. Really polite waitresses  as well.
Good prices. Good shower, bring your own soap and shampoo.

locations.title: Iowa 80 - The World's Largest Truckstop
locations.content: Iowa 80 - The World's Largest Truckstop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ We spent the night in the RV lot after seeking shelter from dangerous winds & possible severe t-storms. We were able to do laundry & shower,  All very clean.  The laundry was very clean & reasonably priced... would definitely recommend! A ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ has many hidden amenities.  A great place for everyone but especially for truckers, and long haulers, as they have laundry and shower facilities as well as a dentist, barber, work out facilities and so much more! We love stopping on our ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ entertainment. There‚Äôs a huge convenience store for your snack needs and a diner that serves both menu items and a buffet. Didn‚Äôt get a shower there but the restrooms were clean. The place has 3 floors that includes a barber. There‚Äôs also ‚Ä¶

Pretty big with lots to do. Has a shower area. Tons of restaurants. Stuff for kids to explore and see. Has a chiropractor on site. This place has leveled up in the last few years by adding tons of stuff. ‚Ä¶

Hadn't been here in years. Went to take a shower on Palm Sunday and Pastor Daryl was giving a sermon in the lounge in front of the showers. The Lord told me to stay. Was warm & friendly service. Then I met with the pastor for 4 hours that ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of necessities and snacks. Spend some time wandering around the main store area, there's plenty to see. Clean restrooms and shower. Navigate through the various gift shops located throughout the facility. You can also get customized ‚Ä¶

World‚Äôs biggest truck stop. Besides truck parking which can park 900 trucks you have a restaurant, theatre, shower rooms, lounge, convince stores. Its is spread in 75 acres. If I am not wrong you can park here for free. It has fuel station ‚Ä¶

This place is huge. There‚Äôs a food court inside the truck stop. Upstairs there are dentist, chiropractor, shower, laundry, hair salon. And the truck section of stuff takes up half of the place. Parking was no problem. There‚Äôs also tesla ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ You can take a shower, get a haircut, and watch a movie. There's even a dentist and a chiropractor. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and friendly service here you can buy too much trick stuff from here lights bumper fittings hoses etc. little price higher Coustmer service very good here i love this location shower also very clean and too much like more than 25 may be

locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Not a bad place, but why do you always have to wait half an hour for a shower???.  I don't understand Pilot executives. Moreover, there was no queue at all when I reserved a shower.  I was informed that I was next. Gorgeous new shower rooms ‚Ä¶

By far one of the best showers üöø
Nice and clean ...
Taco Bell ...   üëç
Employee (she) was very polite when I asked for my shower!   That itself I'd give a 10 ‚≠êÔ∏è... ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Pilot truck stop with a spot to park. The store and restaurant bathroom were clean and inviting. 5:00 am I go in to shower and find out this is a towel change only no cleaning truck stop. The floor was not swept toenails behind the door ‚Ä¶

Truck stop is clean but worker are lazy because I am been waiting for shower from 20 minutes and there are 2 shower ready to be cleaned but no one cares to clean it. So I had to go and ask the staff member to clean it. They weren‚Äôt even ‚Ä¶
New pilot got a lot of truck parking shower and hot food boys

It has everything you‚Äôd expect at a new Pilot, but compared to other locations I was disappointed by the shower pressure/overly soft water/temperature, lack of premium Wi-Fi reach into the lot, and rudeness of staff. Not a bad place to stop ‚Ä¶
Awesome nice shower,hot ,great water pressure,friendly staff, taco bell is a mess but the pilot side very clean, staff very helpful, get rid of the self check out.
Very clean Pilot/Flying J inside and out. Huge restrooms . Shower rooms huge and immaculately clean. Great water pressure. Very friendly staff. Well stocked with all your needs.

On 8/29/23 at around 12:00 noon.
I wish pilot would fire employees that have the audacity to give a paying customer a nasty shower room. I deal with this at every location... it's sad

New Pilot, Nice big showers, great way to to contrast shower!
I wish TacoBell was 24hrs or at least to 02:00 am

locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Tons of truck parking, wide open big spots. All the fuel pumps work. Inside is very clean and well stocked.. Friendly staff. Shower was nice, Clean and hot with good water pressure. This is a good location all around. I will be returning next time in the area.
David McleanLocal Guide ¬∑ 838 reviews ¬∑ 964 photos

Very clean Love‚Äôs location right off interstate 35 with a large truck parking lot and it‚Äôs one of the nicest I have seen in the Midwest. The restrooms and showers are also clean and well maintained. They have a Arby‚Äôs restaurant inside.

The stop itself is very nice, friendly, and clean. But if you are a trucker and need to use the restroom or shower... Put on a good pair of sneakers, it's a long way from the truck parking to the main building.
We stumbled upon this location, and we're so grateful we did. Super clean store, abundant food items, and the various  displays were set extremely well. ‚Ä¶
Great customer service. Very clean bathrooms and showers. Arby's restaurant was good. Very well lit parking.
Love's - consistently clean (though usually busy), esp. the women's bathrooms. Thought it was cool that this one had an Amazon pick-up box.

The stop itself is very nice, friendly, and clean. But if you are a trucker and need to use the restroom or shower... Put on a good pair of sneakers, it's a long way from the truck parking to the main building.

‚Ä¶ Allison and all the staff, thank you AGAIN for another perfect visit to Love's RV Hook Up stop. Cleanest showers, ADA approved! More importantly, kind staff to move around the numbers so I could use the easiest shower for my disabilities. L ‚Ä¶

Mid shower. Toilet wasn't cleaned. Just because it looks clean doesn't mean it is, clean it anyway, unless you just hate tips. Tired of cleaning pubes off the lid before I use it. Shower itself was mediocre at best. Water pressure was ‚Ä¶

Bathrooms were full and dirty booked a shower so I can use the restroom No one's cleaning the showers. They said it'd be 40 minutes. Literally no respect for truckers at this location. I spend good money everywhere I go But if there's no ‚Ä¶

Five stars,  fuelled up in under 5 minutes, no hoodlums taking 30 at the pump and no middleeastern  Hindus washing feet in the sink or taking shower in the toilet bowl. Wish all truck stops were clean and convenient like this one.
Nice and clean. Shower is hot, great pressure and super clean.
2 employees chatting behind the counter and I am waiting in line for shower. 10 showers, 6 in use, 4 dirty and empty and no one bothering to clean them. Waste my time. Hire better people!
The shower water was very soft and I couldn't rinse off the soap after lathering. The salt was so thick, it felt like my skin was coated with a layer of wax. Shower at your own risk.
Girls at fuel desk where super nice and funny, and shower was nice and clean, the girls at Arby's where super nice as well and quick, thanks for a great experience
